name: usage-log-server
description: Express Server where you can get information about your electricity usage, which gets data from a microcontroller that is attached to your meter box

scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run client"

author: Elwyn Van der Borght, Jannick Oste, Raven Van Hove, Kasper Bosteels, Bjarne Van Looke, Alex Van Dijck
